de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.dicthandler

Class DictHandling

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.dict.dicthandler.DictHandling
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsianDictHandler, CuneiDictHandler, LatinDictHandler

    public abstract class DictHandling
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Timo Homburg Abstract class for defining a dictionary or wordmap handler.
